source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT
        mandt,
        proj_id,
        proj_desc1,
        proj_desc2,
        site_adrrs,
        proj_coord,
        site_cont_name1,
        site_cont_tel1,
        site_cont_name2,
        site_cont_tel2,
        geo_fence_id,
        contry_key,
        city,
        post_code,
        region,
        sort_field,
        tele_no,
        fax_no,
        inter_id,
        rec_type,
        udate
    FROM
        sapsr3.ymsdt_pro_hdr
    WHERE
        mandt = '110'
    MINUS
    SELECT
        mandt,
        proj_id,
        proj_desc1,
        proj_desc2,
        site_adrrs,
        proj_coord,
        site_cont_name1,
        site_cont_tel1,
        site_cont_name2,
        site_cont_tel2,
        geo_fence_id,
        contry_key,
        city,
        post_code,
        region,
        sort_field,
        tele_no,
        fax_no,
        inter_id,
        rec_type,
        udate
    FROM
        sapsr3.yesb_pro_hdr
    ORDER BY udate DESC
)
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5;
